attributes.action: acknowledge fetishism and sadomasochism as sane sexual practices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Common sexual practices are classified as illnesses in the International Classification of Diseases (ICD), published by the World Health Organization (WHO).
The government should seek to eliminate the diagnoses of Fetishism (F65.0), Fetishistic Transvestism (F65.1), and Sadomasochism (F65.5) from the current version of ICD. Keep politics out of our bedrooms.
